hadiths.text: It is narrated on the authority of Jarir b. 'Abdullah that the Messenger of Allah (may peace and blessings be upon him) asked him on the occasion of the Farewell Pilgrimage to make the people silent and then said:Do not return to unbelief after me by striking the necks of one another

chapter.ara-name: باب " لاَ تَرْجِعُوا بَعْدِي كُفَّارًا يَضْرِبُ بَعْضُكمْ رِقَابَ بَعْضٍ "
chapter.eng-name: Clarifying the meaning of the Statement of the Prophet (ﷺ): "Do not revert to disbelief (Kuffar) after I am Gone, striking one another's necks"
